name: Chain
review: It is a very good product

name: Abhishek
review: Everything feature justifies the price but battery drains within 3 hours on call it goes maximum of 2 hours

name: Helen Spinner
review: ANC in this price range definitely is a game changer. Its not the best but, its better than nothing.

name: Nagaraj
review: Buds is very premium look nd it's worth for money, anc is pretty good nd bass quality is excellent ....... Love this airbud.......

name: Rudra prathap
review: One ear bud stop working after a few hours of use......

name: Subodh Kumar
review: It had been almost 4 month using this realme buds and I have change my earphones 4 time by visiting service centre.Some time one side does not work.
